channel.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
channel.description:
Geyde PFPs Mafia
![Hydra|690x429](upload://igWQzvEhtkNyiHx2B7YiV0WdujW.png)
*Micro-Setup hosted by Geyde*
### Rules
- Global Forum Rules - [Forum(tm) Mafia(tm) Rules(tm) by(tm) Luxy(tm) the(tm) <small>former</small> Moderator(tm)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926)
Rulebreaks will be handled in a case-by-case basis
### Mechanics
Rolelist:
> [color=green]**Town JOAT**[/color] > [color=green]**Vanilla Town**[/color] x6 > [color=red]**Mafia Goon**[/color] x2
[details="Example Rolecards"]
> # [color=green]The Man Behind the Slaughter[/color] > ![fine then die|135x133](upload://sfoaBywddH1MsQQ8AQBGScpBr3J.jpeg) > **Town JOAT** > > You have multiple night abilities with one use each. > > **Watcher** - Learn who visits the target player during the night. > > **Jailkeeper** - Roleblock a player. They will also be protected from night kills. > > **Cop** - Learn if the target is Mafia. > > Example results: > *Watcher* > > [Player] was visited by [Player2] > > [Player] was not visited by anyone > > *Cop* > > [Player] is Mafia > > [Player] is not Mafia > > *Defeat the Mafia*
> # [color=green]Banana Dragon[/color] > ![f430af9a9f749ad1ab970765b150ab8b|398x495](upload://ux0xfD1SeyE6JfYDITq8L3IOAgY.png) > **Vanilla Town** > > You have no special abilities of your own, but can vote and talk freely. > > *Defeat the Mafia*
> # [color=red]Dagdar[/color] > ![dagdar|242x242](upload://q4RaS6VlDK2bysR1LEfceNHW1fW.jpeg) > **Mafia Goon** > > Your partner is [x]. You may talk to them during the night. > You have access to the factional kill action, which will be decided between you and your partner. > > *Defeat the Town*
[/details]
- 48/24 phases - Banning system is Majority and Plurality. To vote for a ban, type **/vote [put player's name here]** and ping the host in the same post. - Mafia chat is active at all times. - Hydras are legal, but not mandatory. - Post per phase cap of 150, lifted 2 hours before EoD - Minimum post requirement of 10 posts - WotM in effect - No hidden messages allowed
### Lads (/join)
1. The Scientists (katze / marshal) 2. Romeo and Juliet (arete / ami) 3. The Imperial Cult (Napoleon) 4. TheBlueElixir 5. Filler name (Wazza / DatBird) 6. New World Order (ModeShifter / Centuries) 7. Jane 8. Filler name (Derps / Gorta) 9. Filler name (Sulit / Orange)
### Backup (/backup)
1. amelia 2. kyodaz
### Spectator (/spec)
1. maximusprime 2. chloe 3. crichard
[d1 end](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-geyde-pfps-joat9-shit-7-9/82543/1129)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
JK scales with people dying which is why I think it’s always optimal to save it if you aren’t outted

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
you are correct that a jk is not capable of producing redchecks
but it can produce greenchecks if there is only one scum member alive

which is why its power is boosted considerably once that becomes the case

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
my point being that a cop check is town or wolf

whereas JK is town or maybe wolf

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
katze:

well not really because no nightkill can still mean a no action happened or they hit the JK target

with only one scum alive, jk on a target when someone else dies that night is a greencheck on them
that’s how i had tmi on composite materials when you died

yes ofc it’s either or if no one dies

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Napoleon:

Hydra benefits town more than wolves.

agree but objectively speaking 5v2 is wolfsided as heck

Napoleon:

Jailkeep becomes a better cop check once a scum dies yeah

well not really because no nightkill can still mean a no action happened or they hit the JK target

although a kill on a JK night is a greencheck

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
Marshal:

well actually watcher doesn’t really get better but scum will have no say over who is at risk of being watchered if there’s 1 person left and a watcher hit is GG

Jailkeep becomes a better cop check once a scum dies yeah

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
this setup is super swingy being a 9p with a PR

especially because this PR gets much better when 1 maf has died

the watcher and jailkeep both become better and a cop hitting a maf is just a GG

scum has a super low chance of winning if it’s d2 with 1 scum 5vt and 1 joat left

scum has a really good chance of winning if it’s 2 scum and 5 vt left

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Napoleon:

I think this setup was town-sided - we just fucked up.

if the PR doesnt die N1 id maybe agree

PR dying n1 just turns this into 9P mountainous which is scumsided

Napoleon:

Gorta is very underrated .

He’s a much better player than people see him.

imo he has good reads, he’s just not super good at pushing them

i think this has happened in multiple of his games

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
I think this setup was town-sided - we just fucked up.

SirDerpsAlot:

Also if we lynched arete D1 I think

I think lynching Arete woulda increased the chances of happening but I dont know… but it would just give wolves another reason to push on me.

I don’t think TBE woulda voted me though. Gorta (who said he believed it was TvS) and orangelit (who townread Arete) may or may not have.

Hydras benefit town more than scum because town has an extra way to read hydras (allows players to read, is the hydra acting like town masons or wolf partners).

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
arguably the chance of playing bad is decreased when you have a partner to call you out on bad moves/help others see eye to eye with you

And yeah I completely agree that games should be either entirely hydras or no hydras to avoid lopsided engagements like that, I thought it was all hydras when I agreed to partner with sulit tbh

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Geyde PFPs Joat9 - THE LYING DARKNESS AND FIREMAN WINS (2/2)
item.dc:creator: TheBlueElixir
item.description:
Marshal:

hydras / no hydra mix worked fairly well with postcaps because hydras couldn’t just drown people out

as one of the non-hydras

I disagree

maybe because we lynched every single non hydra in a row but anyone with a hydra seems to have an a bit of an edge

but also we mightve just played bad

Read full topic
